This site uses cookies and related technologies, as described in our privacy
policy, for purposes that may include site operation, analytics, enhanced user
experience, or advertising. You may choose to consent to our use of these
technologies or manage your own preferences.

## Welcome to the Party

The Smith x Aleck Nunchucks are the bluetooth helmet speakers that bring
premium sound for days, and handsfree group communication to any ski or
snowboard helmet. Glove-friendly controls help you manage your music, comms,
calls, and voice assistant while going anywhere on the mountain. The Nunchucks
turn your playlist into a private concert, keeps your squad in tough on low-
vis days, and the Friend Finder makes meeting up for aprés easy, no matter the
conditions or crowds. Every day on the snow is a good one, and these Nunchucks
make every run better.

## Product Details

High fidelity audio

For optimal acoustics with crisp highs and hard-hitting bass Aleck tuned these
40mm titanium drivers to get the best all-around sound for any snow helmet. A
powerful EQ was then added in the app to give users the ability to further
fine-tune the ranges dialing in that perfect sound.

Group Comms

The Aleck app provides unlimited range, hands-free group communication over
cell networks. Groups can select the open channel Party Mode or standard Push-
to-Talk (PTT) which functions like a walkie-talkie.

Friend Finder

Losing touch on the mountain happens, especially on storm days and among
riders with different ability levels. Not only can you see real-time location
of everyone in your group, but lift aficionados can also download SkiMaps,
premium maps for detail on hundreds of resorts in the US and Canada.

Universal Fit

The Smith x Aleck Nunchucks feature a low-profile, lightweight design that’s
compatible with any audio-ready snow helmet.

  

Glove Friendly Controls

Oversized buttons make controlling everything easy while wearing gloves or
mittens.

Calls, Siri, & Google Assistant

Use the built-in mic to call your contacts, make Siri commands, or utilize
Google Assistant.

Water Resistant

IPX4 water & sweat resistant.

All-Day Battery

Go from first chair to last, and into après with a 18-hour rechargeable
lithium-polymer battery.

Quickly Add Friends

Easily add someone to the group with a lightning fast QR code or text message.

Premium Audio Components

2 x 40mm titanium drivers, 32 Ω ohms.

Latest Bluetooth Version

Bluetooth 5.2, Dual-mode Bluetooth, AVRCP v1.5, A2DP v1.3, HFP v1.7.

Slim and Featherweight

Slim at 0.56 inches (1.42cm) and lightweight at 2 oz (57g).
